events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position from the candidate eager to join our development team.
The application was reviewed and correctly categorised under the engineering department to proceed with the hiring process.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring journey and ensure smooth communication throughout.
The candidate successfully passed the initial screening with strong technical knowledge relevant to the software engineering role.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed excitement about progressing to the next steps in the technical interview process.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess deeper software development skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating proficient coding and system design capabilities.
HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations for the engineering role.
Candidate completed the HR interview with positive feedback, showing strong alignment with company values and team fit.
An official offer was proposed to the candidate outlining the software engineer position, compensation details, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer for the software engineering role, confirming their commitment to join.
The onboarding process has commenced with the new hire receiving all necessary resources and training schedules.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate successfully integrated into the engineering team.
